name: /WETWARE
description:
/WETWARE

Inspired by watching Slime Moulds grow and explore their surroundings for food, combined with a Teletext-ish aesthetic that I am weirdly nostalgic for. 

Controls

  • LMB click or drag out from any point on the network to grow.
  • LMB click or drag back along the network to retract and regain resources. Retracted network leaves behind residue which cannot be placed upon.
  • RMB to move the camera.

Here's where I got the great PC hard drive audio

This was a bit of a game jam with myself. Enjoy.
